Scroll to reveal.

Scrolling images is a section that you can use to tell a story about your product or service. As you scroll the page, the text is locked for a fixed time so that it is easy to read. The images continue to go past until the next break point is hit. It is a cool way to tell a story. Use it for a step-by-step guide or just as a creative way to showcase your product. On mobile, the images appear as an image list with text under each image. Start scrolling the page to see it in action.

We ❤️ Scrolling Images.

Scrolling images are a great way to call attention to your product features. As the viewer scrolls the page, the descriptions fade in and out.
